header.title: About Us
header.description_1: Chris Chua & Associates LLC was established more than 10 years ago by accomplished down-to-earth lawyers because they believed in doing things differently. We offer a sophisticated range of legal services, together with the skill and experience you would expect from a large, international law firm. We think out of the box and provide our clients exceptional service combined with competitive fee rates.
header.description_2: Our mission is to be a key strategic partner. We believe that the law doesn't operate in a vacuum. We understand the complexity and challenges – be it legal, business or personal. With access to a global network of legal, accounting and financial professionals, we ensure that your interests are protected and continue to grow.
